name: Escape Together [PRE-ALPHA]
description:
This is a pre-alpha, the game still in development !

The princess has fallen to the bottom of the castle cellars, bring her back to the king ! Find the keys that open the doors and don't forget the princess.

Key configuration (keyboard / gamepad) :

Movements : WASD / Joystick
Jump : SPACE / A
Grab : E / X
Throw : E / X
Interact : F / Y
Reload level : R / RB
